org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.mapi.services

Class MetamodelExtensionPoint<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.mapi.services.MetamodelExtensionPoint<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the service interface
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMetamodelServiceProvider<S>

    public class MetamodelExtensionPoint<S>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMetamodelServiceProvider<S>
    Metamodel related service registry.

    Allows registering and querying the metamodel for additional services (audit checkers, label provider, ...)

    Since:
    3.6
    Author:
    cmarin

    • Method Detail

      • getService

        public S getService(MMetamodelFragment metamodelFragment)
        Get a service for the given metamodel fragment.

        Will return null if no matching service provider was registered for the metamodel fragment.

        Specified by:
        getService in interface IMetamodelServiceProvider<S>
        Parameters:
        metamodelFragment - the metamodel fragment
        Returns:
        the found service or null.

      • registerExtension

        public void registerExtension(S service,
                              java.lang.Class<? extends MMetamodelFragment> metamodelFragmentClass)
        Register a metamodel extension.

        Parameters:
        service - the implemented service.
        metamodelFragmentClass - the supported metamodel fragment class.

      • unregisterExtension

        public void unregisterExtension(java.lang.Class<? extends MMetamodelFragment> metamodelFragmentClass)
        Remove a metamodel service provider.
        Parameters:
        metamodelFragmentClass - the metamodel fragment class to forget.

      • findService

        public S findService(MClass cls)
        Find a service for the given metaclass.

        Look for a service for the metaclass origin metamodel fragment. If none is found lookup in the metaclass parent hierarchy for metaclasses from other metamodel fragments.

        Will return null if no matching service provider was found.

        Specified by:
        findService in interface IMetamodelServiceProvider<S>
        Parameters:
        cls - a metaclass
        Returns:
        the found service or null.
